'''''Minecraft: Nether Update (Original Game Soundtrack)''''' is the first soundtrack for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by [[Lena Raine]], who was chosen as a new composer for the game specifically for the [[Nether Update]]. It was released on streaming services starting June 5, 2020.

The album includes 5 songs for a total length of about 20 minutes. It features all of the new tracks created for the [[Nether Update]] biomes, as well as two versions of her Pigstep [[Music Disc]] track.
